Resource.name: CreditLinesService
Resource.Summary: This API enables you to invoke the interfaces defined on 'CreditLinesService'.

Function.Description: Invoke the method 'GetCreditLine' on this service by specifying the payload 'CreditLineParams' in the JSON format.
Invoke the method 'GetValidCreditLineList' on this service.

DataTypes.Description: The 'DataTypes' defines the types referenced by the 'Functions'. It is only for QA, not for info dev.
